Outcome.DescriptionText: As your troops approach the cave entrance, they hear sounds coming from the cave. After throwing down the cave a flare to illuminate surroundings they spotted movement. Unfortunately, a nest of Antlions has made its home here and your troops was able to throw explosives and collapse the cave before they got overhelmed.
